title: Trailblazer League/Tasks/Morytania

properties.name: description
properties.value: Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

content:

Easy[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 10 league points upon completion.

With 12 tasks available, there are a total of 120 league points that can be earned from easy tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Craft a Snelm Craft any Snelm. 15 Crafting N/A
Receive a Slayer Task From Mazchna Receive a Slayer task from Mazchna in Canifis. N/A N/A
Defeat a Werewolf in Morytania Defeat a Werewolf in Morytania. N/A N/A
Defeat One of Fenkenstrain's Experiments Defeat one of Fenkenstrain's Experiments in the Experiment Cave. N/A N/A
Defeat a Ghast Defeat a Ghast in Mort Myre. N/A N/A
Complete the Easy Morytania Diary Complete all of the easy tasks in the Morytania Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Complete an Easy Temple Trek Complete an easy Temple Trek N/A N/A
Visit Port Phasmatys Visit Port Phasmatys. N/A N/A
Pet Frank Pet Darkmeyer's goodest boy. N/A Started Sins of the Father
Obtain a Rune Crossbow From a Lucky Impling Obtain a rune crossbow from a Lucky Impling in Morytania. 89 Hunter N/A
Visit Harmony Island Visit Harmony Island. N/A N/A
Visit Mos Le'Harmless Visit Mos Le'Harmless. N/A N/A

Medium[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 50 league points upon completion.

With 18 tasks available, there are a total of 900 league points that can be earned from medium tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Complete Floor 1 of the Hallowed Sepulchre Complete floor 1 of the Hallowed Sepulchre in Darkmeyer. 52 Agility Completed Sins of the Father
Complete Floor 2 of the Hallowed Sepulchre Complete floor 2 of the Hallowed Sepulchre in Darkmeyer. 62 Agility Completed Sins of the Father
Complete the Canifis Agility Course Complete a lap of the Canifis Rooftop Agility Course. 40 Agility N/A
Complete the Werewolf Agility Course Complete a lap of the Werewolf Agility Course. 60 Agility Ring of Charos (can be pickpocketed from Dr Fenkenstrain in the Harmony Island windmill basement)
Catch a Swamp Lizard in Morytania Catch a Swamp Lizard in Morytania. 29 Hunter N/A
Convert 2,000 Daeyalt Shards Into Essence Convert 2,000 Daeyalt Shards into Daeyalt Essence in Darkmeyer in one go. 60 Mining Completed Sins of the Father
Craft a Rune Using Daeyalt Essence Craft any rune using Daeyalt Essence. 60 Mining Completed Sins of the Father
Assemble a Slayer Helm Assemble a Slayer Helm. 55 Crafting 400 Slayer points
Loot a Barrows Chest Loot a Barrows Chest once. N/A N/A
Defeat a Fiyr Shade Defeat a Fiyr Shade. 65 Firemaking (killing the shade in Temple Trekking doesn't count) N/A
Defeat a Vyrewatch Sentinel Defeat a Vyrewatch Sentinel in Darkmeyer. N/A Completed Sins of the Father
Equip a Piece of any Barrows Armour Set Equip any piece of any Barrows armour set. N/A N/A
Complete the Medium Morytania Diary Complete all of the medium tasks in the Morytania Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Complete a Medium Temple Trek Complete a medium Temple Trek N/A N/A
Complete Haunted Mine Complete the Haunted Mine quest. N/A N/A
Complete A Taste of Hope Complete the A Taste of Hope quest. N/A N/A
Achieve 100% Shades of Mort'Ton Sanctity Achieve 100% Sanctity during the Shades of Mort'ton minigame. N/A N/A
Equip a Salve Amulet (e) Equip a Salve amulet (e). N/A Tarn's Lair miniquest

Hard[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 100 league points upon completion.

With 15 tasks available, there are a total of 1,500 league points that can be earned from hard tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Complete Floor 3 of the Hallowed Sepulchre Complete floor 3 of the Hallowed Sepulchre in Darkmeyer. 72 Agility N/A
Complete Floor 4 of the Hallowed Sepulchre Complete floor 4 of the Hallowed Sepulchre in Darkmeyer. 82 Agility N/A
Complete the Hallowed Sepulchre in 8:00 Complete the Hallowed Sepulchre in Darkmeyer in 8:00 or less. 92 Agility N/A
Purchase a Reward From the Hallowed Sepulchre Purchase a reward from the Hallowed Sepulchre. 52 Agility N/A
Obtain Every Hallowed Tool Obtain all four Hallowed Tools from the Hallowed Sepulchre. 52 Agility Requires hallowed grapple, focus, symbol and hammer
Pickpocket a Vyre 50 Times Pickpocket a Vyre 50 times. 82 Thieving N/A
Defeat a Gargoyle in Morytania Defeat a Gargoyle in Morytania. 75 Slayer N/A
Defeat an Abyssal Demon in Morytania Defeat an Abyssal Demon in Morytania. 85 Slayer N/A
Defeat the Grotesque Guardians 100 Times Defeat the Grotesque Guardians at the Slayer Tower 100 times. 75 Slayer N/A
Equip any Full Barrows Armour Set Equip a full set of any Barrows armour. N/A N/A
Equip a Granite Hammer or Granite Ring Equip either a granite hammer or a granite ring. 75 Slayer N/A
Defeat the Grotesque Guardians Defeat the Grotesque Guardians at the Slayer Tower. 75 Slayer N/A
Complete the Hard Morytania Diary Complete all of the hard tasks in the Morytania Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A
Complete a Hard Temple Trek Complete a hard Temple Trek N/A N/A
Complete Sins of the Father Complete the Sins of the Father quest. N/A N/A

Elite[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 250 league points upon completion.

With 24 tasks available, there are a total of 6,000 league points that can be earned from elite tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Complete Floor 5 of the Hallowed Sepulchre Complete floor 5 of the Hallowed Sepulchre in Darkmeyer. 92 Agility N/A
Complete the Hallowed Sepulchre in 6:30 Complete the Hallowed Sepulchre in Darkmeyer in 6:30 or less. 92 Agility N/A
Equip a Ring of Endurance Equip a Ring of Endurance. 92 Agility N/A
Defeat The Nightmare Defeat The Nightmare in the Sisterhood Sanctuary. N/A N/A
Complete the Theatre of Blood With No Deaths Complete the Theatre of Blood without any party member dying. N/A N/A
Equip Some Guardian Boots Equip a pair of Guardian Boots. 75 Defence Requires Asgarnia✓ unless Bandos Boots are obtained from an Elite Clue Scroll coordinate clue guard (1/1000000).
Equip Every Barrows Armour Set Equip all six sets of Barrows armour. 70 Defence, 70 Magic, 70 Ranged, 70 Attack, 70 Strength N/A
Equip an Inquisitor's Mace Equip an Inquisitor's mace. 75 Attack N/A
Equip a Piece of the Inquisitor's Set Equip any piece of the Inquisitor's armour set. 30 Defence, 70 Strength N/A
Equip a Nightmare Staff Equip a normal Nightmare staff. 65 Magic, 50 Hitpoints N/A
Create an Amulet of Blood Fury Create an amulet of blood fury. 90 Crafting, 87 Magic N/A
Equip an Avernic Defender Equip an Avernic defender. 70 Defence, 70 Attack Requires Asgarnia✓ for Dragon Defender.
Equip a Sanguinesti Staff Equip a Sanguinesti staff. 75 Magic N/A
Equip a Scythe of Vitur Equip a Scythe of Vitur. 75 Attack, 75 Strength N/A
Equip a Piece of the Justiciar Set Equip any piece of the Justiciar armour set. 75 Defence N/A
Equip a Ghrazi Rapier Equip a Ghrazi rapier. 75 Attack N/A
Complete the Theatre of Blood in 20:00 Complete the Theatre of Blood in 20:00 or less challenge time with 3 players or less. N/A N/A
Defeat The Nightmare in 3:00 Defeat The Nightmare in the Sisterhood Sanctuary in 3:00 or less with 5 players or less. N/A N/A
Complete the Theatre of Blood 100 Times Complete the Theatre of Blood 100 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Theatre of Blood 200 Times Complete the Theatre of Blood 200 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Theatre of Blood 350 Times Complete the Theatre of Blood 350 times. N/A N/A
Complete the Theatre of Blood 500 Times Complete the Theatre of Blood 500 times. N/A N/A
Defeat the Grotesque Guardians 250 Times Defeat the Grotesque Guardians at the Slayer Tower 250 times. 75 Slayer N/A
Complete the Elite Morytania Diary Complete all of the elite tasks in the Morytania Achievement Diary. See diary page N/A

Master[edit | edit source]

Each task in this tier awards 500 league points upon completion.

With 4 tasks available, there are a total of 2,000 league points that can be earned from master tasks.

Name Task Skill(s) needed Other requirements
Equip a Full Inquisitor's Set Equip a full set of Inquisitor's armour. 30 Defence, 70 Strength N/A
Equip a Nightmare Staff With an Orb Equip either an Eldritch Nightmare Staff, a Harmonised Nightmare Staff or a Volatile Nightmare Staff. 75 Magic, 50 N/A
Equip a Full Justiciar Set Equip a full set of Justiciar armour. 75 Defence N/A
Complete the Theatre of Blood in 16:00 Complete the Theatre of Blood in 16:00 or less challenge time with 3 players or less. N/A N/A
